Key Match Events: India pulled off a shocking 119-113 win over Pakistan
Fans were ecstatic just to be there, to see perhaps the greatest sports rivalry in the world play out in New York
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted a tough match, with many fans expecting Pakistan to win
Fans were excited to see the longstanding rivalry come to the US
Post-Match Reflections: Fans were thrilled to have watched a cricket match so close to home
The India vs. Pakistan match, part of the 2024 ICC Men’s T20 tournament, follows a stunning U.S. win against Pakistan on Thursday
Miscellaneous Highlights: Fans donned jerseys, wigs and signs supporting their favorite teams and players
The match was attended by thousands of cricket fans from all across the globe
There was reportedly a 90-10 split between India and Pakistan fans
Others: The match was played at Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in New York
